features.featureTitle: Add the newly uploaded image file "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-06 at 9.23.49 AM-1.jpeg" to the frontend static assets and ensure the Demo & Media section loads it correctly in production by matching the exact path referenced by `frontend/src/siteConfig.ts` (`media.images` currently includes `assets/whatsapp-image-2026-02-06-092349.jpeg`). If necessary, rename/copy the uploaded image to `frontend/public/assets/whatsapp-image-2026-02-06-092349.jpeg` so the deployed build contains the asset at that path.
